tool_description: Validates shipping restrictions, prohibited items, and regulatory compliance for domestic and international shipments.

item_categories.description: Categories of items being shipped (electronics, clothing, food, chemicals, etc.)

commercial_shipment.description: Whether this is a commercial shipment

error_messages: Prohibited item detected: One or more items cannot be shipped via selected carrier
International restriction: Items restricted for international shipping to destination country
Value limit exceeded: Declared value exceeds carrier or regulatory limits
Documentation required: Additional documentation needed for shipment approval
Hazmat certification missing: Hazardous materials require special certification
Invalid country codes: Use valid ISO country codes for origin and destination
usage: Provide item details, origin/destination countries, carrier_code, declared_value, and relevant boolean flags to check shipping restrictions.

restricted_items.description: List of items that have restrictions

duty_tax_applicable.description: Whether duties or taxes may apply
